Page

The Page class is a container, which loads all of the elements that may appear on a loaded page.  A page’s content can include, crates, mines, portals etc.

Summary
Page
The Page class is a container, which loads all of the elements that may appear on a loaded page.
Functions
Page
Initializes the Object
empty_object
Empties all of the page objects of their contents.
update
This function will update the instance of the page class with any page objects returned by the server
ids
This function returns an array of all the ids for the various page objects rendered to this tab.
overlay_count
This function returns the total number of overlays in use.
remove_page_object_by_id
This function will remove an item from the list of page objects
has_id
This function accepts an ID and returns true or false if it exists in the array of page objects.
Constants
Page. OBJECTS

Functions

Page

Page = function()

Initializes the Object

empty_object

Page.prototype.empty_objects = function()

Empties all of the page objects of their contents.

update

Page.prototype.update = function(opts)

This function will update the instance of the page class with any page objects returned by the server

Parameters

optsA hash containing these properties
opts.page_objectsHash Contains the page objects returned from the server
opts.panel_idString Reference to the tab, which to render the page objects to.
opts.clobberBoolean If true then the method will create a new page object instead of appending the page objects to an array of exisiting items.

ids

Page.prototype.ids = function()

This function returns an array of all the ids for the various page objects rendered to this tab.

Returns: an array of ids strings.

overlay_count

Page.prototype.overlay_count = function()

This function returns the total number of overlays in use.  This method is helpful for tracking down missing overlays, or ones that should render but don’t.

remove_page_object_by_id

Page.prototype.remove_page_object_by_id = function(id)

This function will remove an item from the list of page objects

Parameters

idThe id of the overlay to find.

Returns TRUE if the removal is successful and false otherwise.

has_id

Page.prototype.has_id = function(id)

This function accepts an ID and returns true or false if it exists in the array of page objects.

Parameters

idThe id to find.
